reviews.title: its a real good monitor for the price
reviews.review_text: nice little monitor, good graphics, easy to set up without instructions, nice long power cord, only wish it came with more than one hdmi port so i could plug in both my ps5 and pc and not have to keep plugging each one in
its alright, idk how to set my hz to 144hz with just the monitor itself bc i use a ps5 to play on it
Monitor came with lines on it, tried to ignore it and one day while gaming the whole bottom half of the screen js starting glitching

Garbage I'm not even a bot you can search me up on Instagram datbrhhh this monitor is garbage no speaker no sound u need external and it don't let you customize nothing it's stuck on booty trash graphic and everything els u are expecting to get you not gonna get

reviews.title: Upset
reviews.review_text: I wasn't happy with how they changed the delivery date after I ordered it and it was late for my sons birthday and told me they would make it right and they haven't

It was a good monitor until i got a DEAD PIXEL in less then 1 week and not only that it didnt not come w its own screws like other monitors do to screw into some monitor arms. worst monitor purchase ever and i have two gawkfolk monitors now this one and another i bought like last year. That one also has a dead pixel but i dont know when that one got it. i think monitors from gawkfolk just suck in general. i wish i could still return this item and get a full refund.
Haven't had this item a year, the color is fading, faint lines going through screen and intermittently jumps.
For what ever reason (I've had this monitor for less than a month but the screen is already showing the dashboard for my Xbox) very nice if I do say so myself.
it shows that it has 200hz on the monitor but when it came it only have 180hz. if you can explain please do so.

reviews.title: Do not buy
reviews.review_text: Bought the monitor for gaming came home box was upside down boxes all ripped up screens all scratched no plastic to protect the screen, thin and cheesy
everything about it great to used. its true games monitored.
The monitor is really sleek and insanely great I really recommend

reviews.title: They sent the wrong product
reviews.review_text: I bought the monitor that was 200Hz and they sent the 120Hz one

reviews.title: Monitor
reviews.review_text: Worth every penny and who don't love to save coins!

reviews.title: excellent product
reviews.review_text: the picture is perfect for what my daughter was looking for. thank you

reviews.title: Nice monitor
reviews.review_text: It's a nice monitor but the screen doesn't adjust or move up or down. That's the only downside to this one. Fast shipping, packaged very well!
The monitor develops lines on the screen after a couple hours of gameplay making you turn it off so you can see clearly again

reviews.title: Help!!
reviews.review_text: The monitor is good but the sound doesn't work does anyone know how to fix that? Yes im a real person!!

reviews.title: Picture is terrible

reviews.title: Skip this one
reviews.review_text: Poor picture quality and even worse sound quality. Do not recommend

reviews.title: false sponsorship

dodnt recieve my order wasnt placed outside my door. said delivered by driver but when i got home it wasnt there

reviews.title: Love this monitor!!
reviews.review_text: Monitor came when it said it would from California to Virginia was delivered on Christmas Eve! Grandson is very happy with it!!

At first i was honestly a little nervous getting this seeing the price but everything came perfect. 180hz and everything. Had no problems at all. Only thing i had problems is adjust the setting but putting it to HDR mode did the trick

reviews.title: It's good
reviews.review_text: well it is good but it would be better if it came with an hdmi 2.1 because when I use the other plug to get 200 hz it makes me lag still a good monitor but maybe consider that

reviews.title: Deceitful advertisement
reviews.review_text: Model number is correct the video is misleading the said usb port there is no usb port it is also listed as curved there is no curve on this monitor this is deceitful advertisement

reviews.title: Do not recommend
reviews.review_text: Out the box it came glitchy cutting in and out and now the volume doesnt work. Only had it for about 2 or 3 days. It couldve been damaged in transport but either way 1 star is being nice

reviews.title: Great buy for those in the market
reviews.review_text: I used to play Xbox on my small tv, and changing over to a monitor was an absolute game changer. This monitor is awesome, the picture is great, no lag or noise, and I did get it on sale but even then, can't beat the price.

reviews.title: Not True to size
reviews.review_text: I purchased two 24.5 inch monitors for my gaming teenager. They are about 21 inches at best. The screen quality is poor at not vivid at all. They are not height adjustable and do not tilt. I will be returning them.

reviews.title: BEST MONITOR
reviews.review_text: Love the monitor best thing I've bought in a while
Good features, HDR capable, AMD FreeSync, Display port 1.2, HDMI 2.0. Wonderful picture.
Everything is good I don't see nothing wrong with this monitor

reviews.title: Screen Positioning
reviews.review_text: You cant adjust the screen it only faces downwards for some reason
Great quality I bought it for my boyfriend %26 he loved it !

reviews.title: buy it
reviews.review_text: its great for the size and the price is great

reviews.title: Great monitor
reviews.review_text: Great monitor, kids love it for there gaming .

reviews.title: Bad stuff
reviews.review_text: I got a 180hz monitor instead of an 200 hz I'm mad ;(
it's not actually 200/165hz it actually 120hz but still a cool and good monitor

reviews.title: Good price good performance
reviews.review_text: Actually really good for the price nice monitor

reviews.title: Wonderful monitor
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love our purchase of this monitor!

reviews.title: Buying another
reviews.review_text: My son loves this so much he asked for a second one for Christmas because he has been carrying it back and forth between my house and his dad's.

reviews.title: What works for him works for me
reviews.review_text: My son seemed to have loved it. So, no complaints here. For reference, he's 15 and uses it for Xbox gaming.

reviews.title: WANT IT, LOVE IT, SO JUST BUY IT!
reviews.review_text: my son LOVES it! I am buying him a second one to have a more intense gaming experience! i definitely suggest buying!
It's has good speeds and graphics but the speakers aren't working so I had to order some external ones

reviews.title: Didn't last a week
reviews.review_text: Monitor offed itself the very next day after receiving it, no warning, no image, just black. Tried every troubleshooting method i could, literally everything. The thing just simply died on me. Hopefully mine was just faulty or something, good monitor for the price i just wouldn't recommend it because of the chance that you could waste 100 dollars.

reviews.title: Absolute best purchase ever!!!!!
reviews.review_text: Having never heard of this brand i was really on the fence about what to expect when it arrived. let me tell you it shipped without incedent and arrived early on top of that it was easy to attach the stand and set up everything a total of 5 minutes if that. Also the company / seller made contact with me the day after just to check quality and satisfaction. I am not being paid whatsoever for this review but believe me when I say Im not messing with any other brand but these guys not only do they do great business but they go way beyond head %26 shoulders in customer service. Ill be upvrading my TV next, aslong as they produce TVs Im getting one from them!!!! Thanks guys for such a great service absolutely no regrets buying from yall. In fact the only negative I could say about this product is it doesnt have a vga input but with an HDMI and Display support who would need one. Not to mention it is completely my fault for not realizing that before the purchase and I plan on upgrading the TV soon anyhow. Thanks again for a great experience.
Since I got it I've been using it a lot. I love it. Works perfect doesn't have any problems.

reviews.title: Size
reviews.review_text: Its good but its small i would just buy a normal monitor but i still would recommend it

reviews.title: You get what you're expecting
reviews.review_text: Everything you'd expect from the claims printed on the box. I'm not a hardcore gamer myself
It came broken with screen impairments, white dots on screen
this monitor has great qualities perfect picture very good

reviews.title: Gawfolk 24.5 curved gaming pc damage!
reviews.review_text: We bought this from Walmart online and supposed this was shipped from a pro seller, the monitor was damaged! They only refunded the cost of the monitor but not the charge for the insurance!

reviews.title: Good but no speakers
reviews.review_text: Great picture easy settings just can't get audio to come through. Guessing there's no speakers in it. I can buy speakers separately to plug in but is annoying if you're planning on buying this. It'd be nice if the company put that somewhere.

reviews.title: screen will turn off
reviews.review_text: the monitor is fantastic but my main issue is it will turn off randomly sometimes for 1.5 seconds, yes its a specific time i have no idea way. thats pretty much the only issue with it, i wish there was a solution with this
There is little numbers in the screen but when you play some games it does not bother you but why is there numbers on the screen?

reviews.title: Don't waste your money!!
reviews.review_text: The picture was great for this monitor. Unfortunately it stopped working after one month, unable to see anything on the monitor.
I love this monitor and even tho I broke it today it was one of the best monitors I've had
